data.title: Give at Work — Roots of Peace
data.text:
Your company may match your donation, doubling your impact.

The companies listed below offer gift matching programs to their employees. Roots of Peace is grateful to these businesses and to their employees who choose to provide financial support for our programs. Below is a brief list of companies that offer matching programs to their employees.

Matching Gifts FAQs

My employer participates in a matching-gift program, but requires verification of my non-profit contribution. What kind of receipt will Roots of Peace provide for my gift and what form do I use to request my employer's match?

Roots of Peace sends a letter with donation information within 48 hours of receipt of the donation. Bring a printed copy to your employer's Human Resources department and request their matching gift form.

If your employer requires verification of your gift from us on a form, please email the form to atashi@rootsofpeace.org. Many companies match gifts through online gift verification services like Benevity, YourCause, etc. for which no additional form will be needed.

Companies will match only the amount paid to Roots of Peace.

Sustaining donors should submit one request annually after they have made their final payment in the current calendar year. Further, companies will also only match the tax deductible amount of your contribution. Roots of Peace will verify the tax deductible portion of your contribution.

If you have any questions, please email atashi@rootsofpeace.org
